description:
This will install the Nero AAC codec utilities to %ChocolateyInstall%\lib\nero-aac and make them available on the system path.  Note that despite being released as a package by Nero with the version 1.5.1, the encoder is actually v1.5.4 while the others are v1.5.1.  Some documentation links will also be installed in the start menu.

- neroAacDec.exe (version 1.5.1.0)
- neroAacEnc.exe (version 1.5.4.0)
- neroAacTag.exe (version 1.5.1.0)

For more information see:

- [Hydrogenaudio](http://wiki.hydrogenaud.io/index.php?title=Nero_AAC)
- [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nero_AAC_Codec)
- [Nero AG](https://web.archive.org/web/20160304031341/http://www.nero.com/enu/company/about-nero/nero-aac-codec.php) (orginal home page for these utilties)
summary: Command line audio AAC encoder/decoder utility
author: Nero AG
